member.name: T:Project.Domain.Entities.AuditableEntity
member.summary: Baseline audit metadata for traceability (NIS2/ISO-aligned evidence). Store UTC timestamps only (ISO 8601) and capture actor identifiers.

member.name: P:Project.Domain.Entities.AuditableEntity.ModifiedBy
member.summary: Actor identifier of the last modifier.

member.name: P:Project.Domain.Entities.AuditableEntity.Version
member.summary: Tracks the version of the entity for concurrency and state management purposes.

member.name: M:Project.Domain.Entities.AuditableEntity.MarkCreated(System.TimeProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Marks the entity as created by setting the creation timestamp, the actor identifier, and initializing the version to 1.
member.param: The instance of TimeProvider used to retrieve the current UTC timestamp.
The identifier of the actor who created the entity.

member.name: M:Project.Domain.Entities.AuditableEntity.MarkModified(System.TimeProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the modification metadata for the entity by setting the modification timestamp, the actor identifier, and incrementing the version number.
member.param: The instance of TimeProvider used to retrieve the current UTC timestamp.
The identifier of the actor who modified the entity.
